subject: Language Arts
title: Telling Your Story: Narrative Writing
learningObjectives: Identify the key elements of a narrative (characters, setting, plot, conflict, resolution).
Brainstorm and plan a personal narrative.
Write a narrative with a clear beginning, middle, and end.

content.body: Narrative writing is all about telling a story. It can be a real story from your life or a fictional story from your imagination.

content.alt: An icon representing a story with a beginning, middle, and end.

content.body: A good narrative has interesting characters, a vivid setting, and a clear plot with a beginning, middle, and end. It also has a conflict, or problem, that the characters must face and resolve.

questions.question: What is the plot of a story?
options: The time and place of the story

questions.question: What is the conflict in a narrative?

content.body: La escritura narrativa se trata de contar una historia. Puede ser una historia real de tu vida o una historia de ficción de tu imaginación.

questions.question: ¿Qué es la trama de una historia?
options: El tiempo y el lugar de la historia

questions.question: ¿Qué es el conflicto en una narrativa?
options: El problema que enfrentan los personajes
